headline: Salesforce (CRM) Bounces Back: Cramer Praises Agentforce’s Strong Growth Despite Analyst Doubts

headline: Salesforce Unveils Agentforce for Retail to Boost Productivity with Digital Labor and Retail Cloud to Unite In-Store and Digital Shopping
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, January 10, 2025--Salesforce (NYSE: CRM), the world’s #1 AI CRM, today unveiled two AI-powered innovations for retailers: Agentforce for Retail and Retail Cloud with Modern POS, helping store associates, customer service representatives, and digital merchants boost productivity and sales, while delivering more personalized shopping experiences.
